messages.title: This election will shape the Britain of tomorrow
messages.content: With another General Election upon us, I am seeking your support for my re-election as your Conservative MP. The last election, held on 23 June 2016, made it clear that no other party can make Brexit a success or deliver a good deal for the people of Rochester and Strood. Our local area has seen significant improvements and continued government investment, including Medway Maritime Hospital and good GP services. It has been a pleasure to represent you, and I hope you will vote to re-elect me as your Member of Parliament.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With another General Election upon us, it is clear that no other party can make Brexit a success or deliver a good deal for the people of Rochester and Strood.

issues.brexitEurope: With another General Election upon us, it is clear that no other party can make Brexit a success or deliver a good deal for the people of Rochester and Strood.

community.content: Our local area has seen significant improvements and continued government investment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I hope you will vote to re-elect me as your Member of Parliament. These last two years have already delivered real success, Medway Maritime Hospital has been a significant focus for improvement and our local general practitioners have set a good example for how public health services and economic prosperity can go hand in hand. These focused local improvement plans are just the start. If re-elected, I will take our local successes to the national level and create the better public services and prosperous future that we can rely on.

examples: including Medway Maritime Hospital and good GP services
